gui.qrystal.no_tool.laser_cutter: Requires Large Qalb Crystal (Octagonal or better)
qrystal.tooltip.hammer: Can crush items and mine crushable blocks.
qrystal.tooltip.hammer+: Throw items on a Smooth Stone, Iron Block or Obsidian and right-click.
qrystal.tooltip.stone_pebbles: Side product, can be crafted into gravel.
qrystal.tooltip.crystallic_obsidian: Artificially crystallized Obsidian, can be used instead of Obsidian in most recipes.
qrystal.tooltip.crystallic_ender_pearl: Artificially crystallized Ender Pearl, can be used instead of Ender Pearl in most recipes.
qrystal.tooltip.coal_dust: Flammable, used for making Activated Carbon.
qrystal.tooltip.charcoal_dust: Flammable, used for making Activated Carbon.
qrystal.tooltip.sulfur_dust: Flammable, main ingredient for Sulfuric Acid.
qrystal.tooltip.quartz_dust: Craft 4 of these to make Pile of Quartz Dust which can be smelted into Fused Quartz.
qrystal.tooltip.quartz_dust_pile: Can be smelted into Fused Quartz.
qrystal.tooltip.activated_carbon: It's high surface area makes it perfect for purifying Water.
qrystal.tooltip.fused_quartz: Type of glass that can withstand very high temperatures and is very unreactive.
qrystal.tooltip.funnel: Can hold Filter Paper for filtering Water.
qrystal.tooltip.condenser: Allows fluids to cool down while passing through, crafting component.
qrystal.tooltip.filter_paper: Used with a Funnel to filter Water.
qrystal.tooltip.endsteel_ingot: High-tier material, because every mod needs one.
qrystal.tooltip.steel_blade: Used in Steel Cutter to cut stuff.
qrystal.tooltip.diamond_blade: Used in Diamond Cutter to cut stuff. Has two times as much durability as Steel Saw Blade.
qrystal.tooltip.redstone_coil: Can transform energy into motion and supports basic logic, crafting component.
qrystal.tooltip.conductive_alloy_coil: More powerful than the Redstone Coil, crafting component.
qrystal.tooltip.ender_coil: Achieves lossless power transmission using the power of the teleporty stuff contained in things from the End, crafting component.
qrystal.tooltip.nano_mesh: This fine grid of holes can filter even the smallest particles, crafting component.
qrystal.tooltip.actuator: Powerful engine which can move parts at high speeds and very precisely, crafting component.
qrystal.tooltip.upgrade_0: Right-click Wooden Condensing Barrel to upgrade it to Stone Condensing Barrel.
qrystal.tooltip.upgrade_1: Right-click Stone Condensing Barrel to upgrade it to Iron Condensing Barrel.
qrystal.tooltip.upgrade_2: Right-click Iron Condensing Barrel to upgrade it to Gold Condensing Barrel.
qrystal.tooltip.upgrade_3: Right-click Gold Condensing Barrel to upgrade it to Imbued Condensing Barrel.
qrystal.tooltip.upgrade_4: Right-click Imbued Condensing Barrel to upgrade it to Steel Condensing Barrel.
qrystal.tooltip.upgrade_5: Right-click Steel Condensing Barrel to upgrade it to Diamond Condensing Barrel.
qrystal.tooltip.upgrade_6: Right-click Diamond Condensing Barrel to upgrade it to Emerald Condensing Barrel.
qrystal.tooltip.upgrade_7: Right-click Emerald Condensing Barrel to upgrade it to Purpsteel Condensing Barrel.
qrystal.tooltip.dust: Dissolve in Evaporationg Bowl or Crystallizer to grow Triangular Crystals.
qrystal.tooltip.qlear_dust: Dissolve in Evaporationg Bowl or Crystallizer with Qeri, Qawa or Qini dust to increase the yield.
qrystal.tooltip.dust_1: Equivalent to 1/36 of Medium Triangular Crystal.
qrystal.tooltip.dust_6: Equivalent to 1/6 of Medium Triangular Crystal.
qrystal.tooltip.crystal_seeds: To grow higher-tier crystals of this material, grow with
qrystal.tooltip.crystal_no_seeds: This material cannot be grown into higher-tier crystals.
qrystal.tooltip.imbued_alloy_chassis.0: The body of a machine, crafting component.
qrystal.tooltip.steel_chassis.0: The body of a machine, crafting component.
qrystal.tooltip.endsteel_chassis.0: The body of a machine, crafting component.
qrystal.tooltip.qeri_ore_rich.0: Can be found on the surface of very high peaks.
qrystal.tooltip.qawa_ore_rich.0: Can be found under the floor of deep oceans.
qrystal.tooltip.qini_ore_rich.0: Can be found under lava lakes low in the world.
qrystal.tooltip.qoid_ore_rich.0: Can be found under Swamps and Mushroom Islands.
qrystal.tooltip.dryer.0: Fill with water, dust and even seeds using Right-Click to grow crystals.
qrystal.tooltip.dryer.1: SHIFT+Right-Click to toggle auto-drop. Can automatically insert into containers below.
qrystal.tooltip.steel_cutter.0: Can cut the same items as the hammers, but with higher yields and side-products.
qrystal.tooltip.steel_cutter.1: Requires Steel Saw Blades and Tier 1 Qrystal Power to run.
qrystal.tooltip.diamond_cutter.0: Similar to Steel Cutter, but 1.5x faster.
qrystal.tooltip.diamond_cutter.1: Requires Diamond Saw Blades and Tier 1 Qrystal Power to run.
qrystal.tooltip.laser_cutter.0: 3x as fast as Steel Cutter with even bigger yields!
qrystal.tooltip.laser_cutter.1: Requires Large Qalb Crystal as a lens and Tier 3 Qrystal Power to run.
qrystal.tooltip.burner_fluid_mixer.0: Used to mix advanced fluids used to dissolve higher-tier Crystals.
qrystal.tooltip.burner_fluid_mixer.1: Runs on the same fuel as Furnace.
qrystal.tooltip.powered_fluid_mixer.0: Similar to Burner Fluid Mixer, but slower.
qrystal.tooltip.powered_fluid_mixer.1: Requires Tier 2 Qrystal Power to run.
qrystal.tooltip.ultimate_fluid_mixer.0: Similar to Powered Fluid Mixer, but 8x as fast.
qrystal.tooltip.ultimate_fluid_mixer.1: Requires Tier 3 Qrystal Power to run.
qrystal.tooltip.basic_evaporator.0: Can grow crystals of any tier or material using appropriate solvent and crystals (and seeds).
qrystal.tooltip.basic_evaporator.1: Runs on the same fuel as Furnace.
qrystal.tooltip.burner_evaporator.0: Advanced version of Basic Crystallizer, but 2.25x as fast.
qrystal.tooltip.burner_evaporator.1: Runs on the same fuel as Furnace, but uses twice as much.
qrystal.tooltip.powered_evaporator.0: Even more advanced version of Basic Crystallizer, 9x as fast.
qrystal.tooltip.powered_evaporator.1: Requires Tier 2 Qrystal Power to run.
qrystal.tooltip.ultimate_evaporator.0: The most advanced version of Basic Crystallizer, 45x as fast.
qrystal.tooltip.ultimate_evaporator.1: Requires Tier 3 Qrystal Power to run.
qrystal.tooltip.condensing_barrel.0: Stores up to %s items of one kind.
qrystal.tooltip.condensing_barrel.1: Automatically converts items into their more or less compact variants (blocks, nuggets) and even their condensed version.
qrystal.tooltip.condensing_barrel.2: SHIFT+Right-Click to change the size of the outputted item stack.
qrystal.tooltip.condensing_barrel.3: Right-Click with a hammer to drop all items and unlock the barrel's item lock.
qrystal.tooltip.qrystal_block: Surround with %s on all four sides to activate.
qrystal.tooltip.activated_qrystal_block: Part of the Tier %s Qrystal Power Reactor, more info on Qalb and Qondo Blocks.
qrystal.tooltip.qalb_block.0: Core of Tier %s Qrystal Power Reactor.
qrystal.tooltip.qalb_block.1: Is activated only while touching all six Tier %s Qrystal Blocks, all except Qondo must be activated.
qrystal.tooltip.qalb_block.2: Also has to have Activated Tier 1 Qondo Blocks one block further on all sides where it's not touching a Qondo Block
qrystal.tooltip.qalb_block.3: Also has to have Activated Tier 2 Qondo Blocks three blocks further on all sides where it's not touching a Qondo Block
qrystal.tooltip.qondo_block.0: Power conduit of Tier %s Qrystal Power Reactor.
qrystal.tooltip.qondo_block.1: Is activated only while touching Activated Tier %s Qalb Block.
qrystal.tooltip.qondo_block.2: When activated, supplies Tier %s Emitters with Qrystal Power.
qrystal.tooltip.receiver.1: When activated, supplies Tier %s Emitters with Qrystal Power.
qrystal.tooltip.emitter_0.0: Transmits Tier 1 Qrystal Power when placed on Tier 1 Activated Qondo Block or Activated Receiver.
qrystal.tooltip.emitter_0.1: Range 15 blocks, can go through transparent blocks and Qrystal Power consuming blocks.
qrystal.tooltip.emitter_1.0: Transmits Tier 2 Qrystal Power when placed on Tier 2 Activated Qondo Block or Activated Receiver.
qrystal.tooltip.emitter_1.1: Range 15 blocks, can go through transparent blocks and Qrystal Power consuming blocks.
qrystal.tooltip.emitter_2.0: Transmits Tier 3 Qrystal Power when placed on Tier 3 Activated Qondo Block or Activated Receiver.
qrystal.tooltip.emitter_2.1: Range 15 blocks, can go through transparent blocks and Qrystal Power consuming blocks.
qrystal.tooltip.reservoir.0: Can store up to 8000mB of single fluid.
qrystal.tooltip.condensed_material: Place in crafting grid to turn uncondense.
